      Source code for pycheron.plotting.rankingPlot

      
import json

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

from pycheron.db.sqllite_db import Database
from pycheron.plotting.dailyPdfPlot import *
from pycheron.psd.noise.networkNoiseModel import networkNoiseModel
from pycheron.psd.psdList import psdList
from pycheron.psd.psdStatistics import psdStatistics
from pycheron.util.format import parse_snclq
from pycheron.util.getChannel import getChannelName
from pycheron.util.getSta import getStationName

__all__ = ["rankPlot"]



      [docs]def rankPlot(st, f_name=None, model="nlnm", rank_by=None, nnm_fname=None, database=None, station=None, network=None,
             channel=None, location=None, session=None):
    """
    This takes in network level streams and ranks the plots

    :param st: obspy stream OR Database object
    :type st: obspy.core.stream.Stream or pycheron.db.sqllite_db.Database
    :param f_name: name of output file to save ranking plot
    :type f_name: str
    :param model: Model. "nlnm" (new low noise model) or "nnm" (network noise model).
    :type model: str
    :param rank_by: Array of period values to rank the stations at. If none, default will be [1, 6.5, 30, 100]
    :type rank_by: numpy.ndarray
    :param nnm_fname: If supplied, plot of network noise model will be saved
    :type nnm_fname: str
    :param database: database object
    :type database: pycheron.db.sqllite_db.Database
    :param station: Use only if **st** is database object. Station name
    :type station: str
    :param network: Use only if **st** is database object. Network name
    :type network: str
    :param channel: Use only if **st** is database object. Channel name
    :type channel: str
    :param location: Use only if **st** is database object. Location name
    :type location: str
    :param session: Use only if **st** is database object. Session name
    :type session: str


    **Example**

    .. code-block:: python

        # Import libs
        from obspy.clients.fdsn import Client
        from plotting.rankingPlot import rankPlot
        from obspy import UTCDateTime

        client = Client("IRIS")
        t = UTCDateTime("2019-09-10T00:00:00")
        te = UTCDateTime("2019-09-10T05:00:00")
        st = client.get_waveforms("CI", "*", "*", "H*", t, te)

        rankPlot(st, model="gsn")

    .. image:: _static/rankPlot.png

    """

    if rank_by is None:
        rank_by = [1, 6.5, 30, 100]

    df_e = pd.DataFrame()
    df_n = pd.DataFrame()
    df_z = pd.DataFrame()

    if isinstance(st, Database):
        _rankPlot_from_database(st, f_name, model, rank_by, nnm_fname, station, network, channel, location,
                                session)
    else:
        network, station, channel, location, quality = parse_snclq(st[0].get_id())

        # Network Noise Model
        if model == "nnm":
            # If database object, check to see if we already have the psds calculated
            if database is not None:
                time = (st[0].stats.starttime.isoformat(), st[0].stats.endtime.isoformat())
                tb = database.get_metric("networkNoiseModel", network=network, station=station, channel=channel,
                                         location=location,
                                         session=session, time=time)

                # if returns no data, calculate and insert into db
                if tb.empty:
                    networkNoiseModel(st, plot=True, fname=nnm_fname, station=station, network=network,
                                      channel=channel,
                                      session=session, database=database)

                    _rankPlot_from_database(st, f_name, model, rank_by, nnm_fname, station, network, channel, location,
                                            session)
                else:
                    _rankPlot_from_database(st, f_name, model, rank_by, nnm_fname, station, network, channel, location,
                                            session)

            else:
                nnm_model = networkNoiseModel(st, plot=True, fname=nnm_fname, station=station, network=network,
                                              channel=channel,
                                              session=session, database=database)
                # Stations for E/N Model
                sta_en = nnm_model["stations_en"]
                # Stations for Z Model
                sta_z = nnm_model["stations_z"]
                # Power from E/N Model
                m_power_en = nnm_model["enModel"]
                # Power from Z Model
                m_power_z = nnm_model["zModel"]
                # Model period
                m_period = m_power_en.index
                # Grabbing psd stats from output of networkNoiseModel
                psds = nnm_model["psdStats"]  # TODO
                # PSD periods
                period = 1 / psds[0][0]["noise_matrix_frequency"][np.where(m_period)]

                # for Z channel
                # looping through channels
                for i in xrange(len(psds[0])):
                    # loopinf through Z stations
                    for j in xrange(len(sta_z)):
                        # grabbing channel name
                        chan = getChannelName(psds[j][i]["snclq"])
                        # grabbing Z channel
                        if chan.endswith("Z"):
                            chan_z = chan
                            # getting mode
                            mode = psds[j][i]["mode"]
                            # getting the difference between actual and network noise model
                            diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power_z, m_period)
                            # adding data to DF
                            df2 = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                            df_z = df_z.append(df2, ignore_index=True)

                # adding indexs
                df_z["Station"] = sta_z
                df_z = df_z.rename(df_z["Station"])
                df_z = df_z.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

                for i in xrange(len(psds[0])):
                    # loopinf through E/N stations
                    for j in xrange(len(sta_en)):
                        # grabbing channel name
                        chan = getChannelName(psds[j][i]["snclq"])
                        # grabbing E channel
                        if chan.endswith("E"):
                            chan_e = chan
                            mode = psds[j][i]["mode"]
                            # getting the difference between actual and network noise model
                            diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power_en, m_period)
                            # adding data to DF
                            df2_e = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                            df_e = df_e.append(df2_e, ignore_index=True)

                        # grabbing N channel
                        if chan.endswith("N"):
                            chan_n = chan
                            mode = psds[j][i]["mode"]
                            # getting the difference between actual and network noise model
                            diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power_en, m_period)
                            # adding data to DF
                            df2 = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                            df_n = df_n.append(df2, ignore_index=True)
                # adding station as index
                df_e["Station"] = sta_en
                df_e = df_e.rename(df_e["Station"])
                df_e = df_e.drop(["Station"], axis=1)
                # adding station as index
                df_n["Station"] = sta_en
                df_n = df_n.rename(df_n["Station"])
                df_n = df_n.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

        if model == 'nlnm':
            if database is not None:
                time = (st[0].stats.starttime.isoformat(), st[0].stats.endtime.isoformat())
                tb = database.get_metric("networkNoiseModel", network=network, station=station, channel=channel,
                                         location=location,
                                         session=session, time=time)

                # if returns no data, calculate and insert into db
                if tb.empty:
                    networkNoiseModel(st, plot=True, fname=nnm_fname, station=station, network=network,
                                      channel=channel,
                                      session=session, database=database)

                    _rankPlot_from_database(st, f_name, model, rank_by, nnm_fname, station, network, channel, location,
                                            session)
                else:
                    _rankPlot_from_database(st, f_name, model, rank_by, nnm_fname, station, network, channel, location,
                                            session)
            else:
                sta_n = []
                sta_e = []
                sta_z = []

                psds = psdList(st)
                freq = psds[0][0][0]
                period = 1 / freq
                period = period[np.where(period > .1)]
                stats = psdStatistics(psds, evalresp=None, database=database)
                for i in xrange(len(stats)):
                    chan = getChannelName(stats[i]["snclq"])
                    if chan.endswith("N"):
                        sta_n.append(stats[i]["snclq"].split(".")[1])
                        chan_n = chan
                        mode = stats[i]["mode"][np.where(period)]
                        m_period = 1 / stats[i]["Noise_Matrix_Frequency"][np.where(period)]
                        m_power = stats[i]["nlnm"][np.where(period)]
                        diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power, m_period)
                        # adding data to DF
                        df2 = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                        df_n = df_n.append(df2, ignore_index=True)
                    if chan.endswith("E"):
                        sta_e.append(stats[i]["snclq"].split(".")[1])
                        chan_e = chan
                        mode = stats[i]["mode"][np.where(period)]
                        m_period = 1 / stats[i]["Noise_Matrix_Frequency"][np.where(period)]
                        m_power = stats[i]["nlnm"][np.where(period)]
                        diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power, m_period)
                        # adding data to DF
                        df2_e = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                        df_e = df_e.append(df2_e, ignore_index=True)
                    if chan.endswith("Z"):
                        sta_z.append(stats[i]["snclq"].split(".")[1])
                        chan_z = chan
                        mode = stats[i]["mode"][np.where(period)]
                        m_period = 1 / stats[i]["Noise_Matrix_Frequency"][np.where(period)]
                        m_power = stats[i]["nlnm"][np.where(period)]
                        diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power, m_period)
                        # adding data to DF
                        df2 = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                        df_z = df_z.append(df2, ignore_index=True)

                # adding station as index
                df_z["Station"] = sta_z
                df_z = df_z.rename(df_z["Station"])
                df_z = df_z.drop(["Station"], axis=1)
                # adding station as index
                df_e["Station"] = sta_e
                df_e = df_e.rename(df_e["Station"])
                df_e = df_e.drop(["Station"], axis=1)
                # adding station as index
                df_n["Station"] = sta_n
                df_n = df_n.rename(df_n["Station"])
                df_n = df_n.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

                snclq = psds[0][0]["snclq"]

                # If st is a path to PSDS folder, we need to aggregate the data. This is done by looping through each station
                # and taking the mode and overwiring the previous DF
                if isinstance(st, str):
                    columns = df_e.columns
                    df_e_agg = pd.DataFrame()
                    df_n_agg = pd.DataFrame()
                    df_z_agg = pd.DataFrame()
                    for i in np.unique(sta_e):
                        tmp_e = []
                        tmp_n = []
                        tmp_z = []

                        for j in columns:
                            # If a station only has 1 row
                            if isinstance(df_e[j].loc[i], np.float64):
                                tmp_e.append(df_e[j].loc[i])
                                tmp_n.append(df_n[j].loc[i])
                                tmp_z.append(df_z[j].loc[i])
                            else:
                                if len(df_e[j].loc[i].mode()) > 1:
                                    tmp_e.append(df_e[j].loc[i].mode().mean())
                                else:
                                    tmp_e.append(df_e[j].loc[i].mode()[0])

                                if len(df_n[j].loc[i].mode()) > 1:
                                    tmp_n.append(df_n[j].loc[i].mode().mean())
                                else:
                                    tmp_n.append(df_n[j].loc[i].mode()[0])

                                if len(df_z[j].loc[i].mode()) > 1:
                                    tmp_z.append(df_z[j].loc[i].mode().mean())
                                else:
                                    tmp_z.append(df_z[j].loc[i].mode()[0])

                        df_e_agg = df_e_agg.append(
                            pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(tmp_e).reshape(1, len(tmp_e)), columns=columns),
                            ignore_index=True)
                        df_n_agg = df_n_agg.append(
                            pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(tmp_n).reshape(1, len(tmp_n)), columns=columns),
                            ignore_index=True)
                        df_z_agg = df_z_agg.append(
                            pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(tmp_z).reshape(1, len(tmp_z)), columns=columns),
                            ignore_index=True)

                    df_e = df_e_agg
                    df_e["Station"] = np.unique(sta_e)
                    df_e = df_e.rename(df_e["Station"])
                    df_e = df_e.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

                    df_n = df_n_agg
                    df_n["Station"] = np.unique(sta_e)
                    df_n = df_n.rename(df_n["Station"])
                    df_n = df_n.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

                    df_z = df_z_agg
                    df_z["Station"] = np.unique(sta_e)
                    df_z = df_z.rename(df_z["Station"])
                    df_z = df_z.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

        # ranking data
        for k in rank_by:
            # finding period closest to input
            if df_z.empty == False:
                # finding period closest to input
                index_dz = _find_nearest(np.asarray(df_z.columns, dtype=float), k)
                # sorting values
                df_z_rank = df_z.sort_values(by=[df_z.columns[index_dz]])
                # plotting
                _plot_grid(df_z_rank, snclq, plot="stationRanking", f_name=f_name + chan_z + "_" + str(k),
                          channel=chan_z,
                          rank=float(df_z.columns[index_dz]))

            if df_e.empty == False:
                # finding period closest to input
                index_de = _find_nearest(np.asarray(df_e.columns, dtype=float), k)
                # sorting values
                df_e_rank = df_e.sort_values(by=[df_e.columns[index_de]])
                # plotting
                _plot_grid(df_e_rank, snclq, plot="stationRanking", f_name=f_name + chan_e + "_" + str(k),
                          channel=chan_e,
                          rank=float(df_e.columns[index_de]))

            if df_n.empty == False:
                # finding period closest to input
                index_dn = _find_nearest(np.asarray(df_n.columns, dtype=float), k)
                # sorting values
                df_n_rank = df_n.sort_values(by=[df_n.columns[index_dn]])
                # plotting
                _plot_grid(df_n_rank, snclq, plot="stationRanking", f_name=f_name + chan_n + "_" + str(k),
                          channel=chan_n,
                          rank=float(df_n.columns[index_dn]))
      


def _rankPlot_from_database(database, f_name=None, model="nlnm", rank_by=None, nnm_fname=None, station=None,
                            network=None, channel=None, location=None, session=None):
    df_e = pd.DataFrame()
    df_n = pd.DataFrame()
    df_z = pd.DataFrame()

    if model == 'nnm':
        tb = database.get_metric("networkNoiseModel", network=network, station=station, channel=channel,
                                 location=location,
                                 session=session)

        # if returns no data, calculate and insert into db
        if tb.empty:
            networkNoiseModel(database, plot=True, fname=nnm_fname, station=station, network=network,
                              channel=channel,
                              session=session, database=database)

            tb = database.get_metric("networkNoiseModel", network=network, station=station, channel=channel,
                                     location=location,
                                     session=session)

        # find index number of nnm which has highest number of stations
        num_stations_en = 0
        index_en = 0
        num_stations_z = 0
        index_z = 0
        for i in range(len(tb)):
            stations_en = len(np.unique(json.loads(tb["stations_en"].iloc[i])))
            stations_z = len(np.unique(json.loads(tb["stations_z"].iloc[i])))
            if num_stations_en < stations_en:
                num_stations_en = stations_en
                index_en = i
            if num_stations_z < stations_z:
                num_stations_z = stations_z
                index_z = i

        # Stations for E/N Model
        sta_en = json.loads(tb["stations_en"].iloc[index_en])
        # Stations for Z Model
        sta_z = json.loads(tb["stations_z"].iloc[index_z])
        # Power from E/N Model

        m_power_en = json.loads(tb["enModel"].iloc[index_en])[1]
        # Power from Z Model
        m_power_z = json.loads(tb["zModel"].iloc[index_en])[1]
        # Model period
        m_period = json.loads(tb["enModel"].iloc[index_en])[0]

        stats = json.loads(tb["psdStats"].iloc[index_en])

        for i in range(len(stats["mode"])):
            stats["snclq"][i] = json.loads(stats["snclq"][i])
            for j in range(len(stats["mode"][i])):
                stats["noise_matrix_frequency"][i][j] = json.loads(stats["noise_matrix_frequency"][i][j])
                stats["mode"][i][j] = json.loads(stats["mode"][i][j])

        # PSD periods
        freq = np.asarray(stats["noise_matrix_frequency"][0][0])
        mode_list = stats["mode"]
        snclq_list = stats["snclq"]
        snclq = stats["snclq"][0]  # need for color grad but only uses network, so does not matter which snclq we use
        period = 1 / freq[np.where(m_period)]

        # for Z channel
        # looping through stations in snclq list
        for i in xrange(len(sta_z)):
            # looping through each channel
            df2 = pd.DataFrame()
            for j in xrange(len(snclq_list)):
                if sta_z[i] == getStationName(snclq_list[j][0]):
                    # grabbing channel name
                    for k in xrange(len(snclq_list[j])):
                        chan = getChannelName(snclq_list[j][k])
                        # grabbing Z channel
                        if chan.endswith("Z"):
                            chan_z = chan
                            # getting mode
                            mode = mode_list[j][k]
                            # getting the difference between actual and network noise model
                            diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power_z, m_period)
                            # adding data to DF
                            df_z_temp = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                            df2 = df2.append(df_z_temp)
            df2 = df2.mode()
            if len(df2) > 1:
                df2 = df2.mean()
            df_z = df_z.append(df2, ignore_index=True)

        # adding indexs
        df_z["Station"] = sta_z
        df_z = df_z.rename(df_z["Station"])
        df_z = df_z.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

        for i in xrange(len(sta_en)):
            # loopinf through E/N stations
            df2_e = pd.DataFrame()
            df2_n = pd.DataFrame()
            for j in xrange(len(snclq_list)):
                if sta_en[i] == getStationName(snclq_list[j][0]):
                    for k in xrange(len(snclq_list[j])):
                        # grabbing channel name
                        chan = getChannelName(snclq_list[j][k])
                        # grabbing E channel
                        if chan.endswith("E"):
                            chan_e = chan
                            mode = mode_list[j][k]
                            # getting the difference between actual and network noise model
                            diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power_en, m_period)
                            # adding data to DF
                            df2_e_temp = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                            df2_e = df2_e.append(df2_e_temp)

                        # grabbing N channel
                        if chan.endswith("N"):
                            chan_n = chan
                            mode = mode_list[j][k]
                            # getting the difference between actual and network noise model
                            diff, per = _noiseDiff(period, mode, m_power_en, m_period)
                            # adding data to DF
                            df2_n_temp = pd.DataFrame(data=np.asarray(diff).reshape(1, len(diff)), columns=per)
                            df2_n = df2_e.append(df2_n_temp)

            df2_e = df2_e.mode()
            if len(df2_e) > 1:
                df2_e = df2_e.mean()
            df_e = df_e.append(df2_e, ignore_index=True)

            df2_n = df2_n.mode()
            if len(df2_n) > 1:
                df2_n = df2_n.mean()
            df_n = df_n.append(df2_n, ignore_index=True)

        # adding station as index
        df_e["Station"] = sta_en
        df_e = df_e.rename(df_e["Station"])
        df_e = df_e.drop(["Station"], axis=1)
        # adding station as index
        df_n["Station"] = sta_en
        df_n = df_n.rename(df_n["Station"])
        df_n = df_n.drop(["Station"], axis=1)

    if model == "nlnm":
        sta_n = []
        sta_e = []
        sta_z = []

        psds = psdList(st)
        freq = psds[0][0][0]
        period = 1 / freq
        period = period[np.where(period > .1)]
        stats = psdStatistics(psds, evalresp=None, database=database)

    # ranking data
    for k in rank_by:
        # finding period closest to input
        if df_z.empty == False:
            if f_name != None:
                f_name_z = f_name + chan_z + "_" + str(k)
            else:
                f_name_z = f_name
            # finding period closest to input
            index_dz = _find_nearest(np.asarray(df_z.columns, dtype=float), k)
            # sorting values
            df_z_rank = df_z.sort_values(by=[df_z.columns[index_dz]])
            # plotting
            _plot_grid(df_z_rank, snclq, plot="stationRanking", f_name=f_name_z,
                      channel=chan_z,
                      rank=float(df_z.columns[index_dz]))

        if df_e.empty == False:
            if f_name != None:
                f_name_e = f_name + chan_e + "_" + str(k)
            else:
                f_name_e = f_name
            # finding period closest to input
            index_de = _find_nearest(np.asarray(df_e.columns, dtype=float), k)
            # sorting values
            df_e_rank = df_e.sort_values(by=[df_e.columns[index_de]])
            # plotting
            _plot_grid(df_e_rank, snclq, plot="stationRanking", f_name=f_name_e,
                      channel=chan_e,
                      rank=float(df_e.columns[index_de]))

        if df_n.empty == False:
            if f_name != None:
                f_name_n = f_name + chan_n + "_" + str(k)
            else:
                f_name_n = f_name
            # finding period closest to input
            index_dn = _find_nearest(np.asarray(df_n.columns, dtype=float), k)
            # sorting values
            df_n_rank = df_n.sort_values(by=[df_n.columns[index_dn]])
            # plotting
            _plot_grid(df_n_rank, snclq, plot="stationRanking", f_name=f_name_n,
                      channel=chan_n,
                      rank=float(df_n.columns[index_dn]))
